DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this research is to assess the impact of three basal (long-acting) insulin treatments on blood glucose levels in people with type 1 diabetes when performing physical exercise.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Exercise on Blood Glucose Levels in Patients With Type 1 Diabetes: A Comparison of 3 Long-acting Insulins
DOC.criteria: Type 1 Diabetes Current basalbolus insulin therapy HbA1c < 10% BMI < 32 kg/m2 Proliferative Retinopathy / Maculopathy Recurrent major hypoglycaemias Impaired hepatic or renal function Cardiac Problems Uncontrolled hypertension
